name: Node Connect
description: Node Connect is a game where you connect with other nodes to reach the end goal. To connect with other nodes, use the mouse and click where you want to connect. There are three types of nodes that move in different ways: Left-Right, Up-Down, and All directions. If a node touches a red circle the level will restart. To win a level, a node has to touch the green circle. If you get stuck in a level, press Esc to open the pause menu and click restart.
